title: The misuse shall be ascertained by physical site verification of the said private IT park / Data Center by a team of officers from the Directorate of Industries and the Planning Authority which has approved the building plans of the said private IT park
clause_text: The misuse shall be ascertained by physical site verification of the said private IT park / Data Center by a team of officers from the Directorate of Industries and the Planning Authority which has approved the building plans of the said private IT park.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
